mapper.insert: insert into BaphiqApCat (apCatId, apCatCName, apCatEName, apCatSort, apCatIconUrl) values (#{apcatid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apcatcname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{apcatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apcatsort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{apcaticonurl,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select
from BaphiqApCat order by apCatSort

select distinct
from BaphiqInfoUser cross apply dbo.SplitStrings(ugrpid, ',') as a join Baphiqugrp b on a.item=b.ugrpid join BaphiqugrpAp c on b.ugrpid=c.ugrpid join Baphiqap d on c.apid=d.apid join Baphiqapcat e on d.apCat = e.apCatId where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} and (c.apFunc & 1 =1) order by e.apcatsort

select * from ( select row_number() over (order by apCatSort) as row_num,
from BaphiqApCat ) as tb where row_num between ((#{page} - 1) * #{showNum} + 1) and (#{page}*#{showNum})
